AnnouncerRMIBroadcast - Class in it.escape.core.server.model
Announcer based on the RMI system, instead of being an observable carrying a message string, it directly invokes specific remote methods in everyone among its subscribers.
AnnouncerRMIBroadcast() - Constructor for class it.escape.core.server.model.AnnouncerRMIBroadcast
 
AnnouncerStrings - Class in it.escape.core.server.model
AnnouncerStrings class: simple observable, relays a message to the observers; those are located in the server view (our net-communication threads).
AnnouncerStrings() - Constructor for class it.escape.core.server.model.AnnouncerStrings
